rescuecore2

Interface GUIComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CollapseSimulator, ComponentManager, LineOfSightPerception, MiscSimulator, ScoreGraph, ScoreTable, StandardPerception, StandardWorldModelViewerComponent, TrafficSimulator

    public interface GUIComponent
    Tagging interface for objects that have a GUI component.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.swing.JComponent getGUIComponent()
      Get a JComponent that should be added to the GUI.
      java.lang.String getGUIComponentName()
      Get the name of this part of the GUI.

    • Method Detail

      • getGUIComponent

        javax.swing.JComponent getGUIComponent()
        Get a JComponent that should be added to the GUI.
        Returns:
        A JComponent.

      • getGUIComponentName

        java.lang.String getGUIComponentName()
        Get the name of this part of the GUI. This will be used in things like tabbed panes and borders around GUI components.
        Returns:
        The name of this GUI component.
